  1. …in reply to @KatieLangerman
    KatieLangerman peruvianidol the tricky thing about font loading is that your font files are too slow and the rest of your site is too fast 😅 You’re racing first render on 6.1 kB or HTML/CSS against 71.4 kB of fonts I think your options are: 1. subset and preload the subset 2. make your site slower 😅
